title: Vojvodina
summary: Vojvodina (/ˌvɔɪvəˈdiːnə/ voy-və-DEE-nə)[4][Note 1] is an autonomous province that occupies the northernmost part of Serbia. It lies within the Pannonian Basin, bordered to the south by the national capital Belgrade and the Sava and Danube Rivers. The administrative center, Novi Sad, is the second-largest city in Serbia.
